title: Brighton Oceanfront Escape Located Nearby Brighton Palace Pier
description: Stay close to Brighton's iconic pier and experience the effortlessly cool seaside vibes when you stay at Holiday Inn Brighton - Seafront, an IHG Hotel, boasting a top-notch oceanfront location. While you're here, enjoy a craft beer or burgers at the hotel's restaurant, or enjoy a Starbucks coffee on the terrace while listening to gentle ocean waves. The hotel is just a 15-minute walk to Brighton Palace Pier, home to exciting rides, bars, restaurants and sea-facing deckchairs for admire ocean views.
location_description: Holiday Inn Brighton - Seafront, an IHG Hotel
